text: Lucille Theresa Bliss (March 31, 1916 - November 8, 2012) was an American movie, television, stage, radio, and voice actress. She was known for being the voice of Smurfette in The Smurfs. Bliss was born on March 31, 1916 in New York City, New York. Her career began in 1935 and lasted until her death in 2012. Bliss died on November 8, 2012 in Costa Mesa, California from natural causes, aged 96.Lucille Bliss dies at 96; voice of Crusader Rabbit and Smurfette Los Angeles Times. title: Lucille Bliss
